Package com.hexanome16.client.screens.game.prompts.components

Interface PromptTypeInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AssociateBagCard, BonusChoiceAbstract, BuyCardByCard, BuyCardPrompt, BuyingBagCard, BuyingReserved, BuyReserveNobleCard, ChoicePromptAbstract, ChooseNoble, ChooseNobleReserve, NobleChoiceAbstract, Pause, SeeCards, SeeOtherReserved, SeeOwnReserved, SeeReservedAbstract, TokenAcquiring, TokenAcquiringThree, TokenAcquiringTwo
public interface PromptTypeInterface
Interface to implement for prompts, contains an enum of all the possible prompt types as well (add the new type to the enum and enum map for it to be usable). Also contains some useful methods.

  • Method Details

    • setOnHoverEffectOpacity

      static void setOnHoverEffectOpacity(javafx.scene.Node hoveredOver, javafx.scene.Node affectedNode, double lowerOpacity, double upperOpacity)
      Changes the opacity of affected Node to upperOpacity when mouse enters hoveredOver, changes the opacity of affected Node to lowerOpacity when mouse leaves hoveredOver.
      Parameters:
      hoveredOver - Node that the mouse is hovering Over.
      affectedNode - Node affected by the hover.
      lowerOpacity - Opacity of affectedNode after mouse stops hovering over hoveredNode.
      upperOpacity - Opacity of affectedNode after mouse starts hovering over hoveredNode.

    • setOnHoverEffectOpacity

      static void setOnHoverEffectOpacity(javafx.scene.Node hoveredOver, javafx.scene.Node affectedNode, double lowerOpacity, double upperOpacity, Predicate<Object> condition, Object toTest)
      Alternative function to setOnHoverEffectOpacity, takes a condition before doing the changes. Changes the opacity of affected Node to upperOpacity when mouse enters hoveredOver, changes the opacity of affected Node to lowerOpacity when mouse leaves hoveredOver.
      Parameters:
      hoveredOver - Node that the mouse is hovering Over.
      affectedNode - Node affected by the hover.
      lowerOpacity - Opacity of affectedNode after mouse stops hovering over hoveredNode.
      upperOpacity - Opacity of affectedNode after mouse starts hovering over hoveredNode.
      condition - a Predicate object which makes the changes happen only if it is true.
      toTest - the Object to test for the condition

    • getWidth

      double getWidth()
      Getter method to access prompt width.
      Returns:
      The prompt's width.

    • getHeight

      double getHeight()
      Getter method to access prompt height.
      Returns:
      The prompt's height.

    • populatePrompt

      void populatePrompt(com.almasb.fxgl.entity.Entity entity)
      Method which populates the prompt with elements specific to the prompt type.
      Parameters:
      entity - entity associated to the prompt component that called this method.
